name: MTLCommandEncoder
desc: An encoder that writes GPU commands into a command buffer.

items.name: func endEncoding()
items.desc: Declares that all command generation from the encoder is completed.

items.name: func insertDebugSignpost(String)
items.desc: Inserts a debug string into the captured frame data.

items.name: func pushDebugGroup(String)
items.desc: Pushes a specific string onto a stack of debug group strings for the command encoder.

items.name: func popDebugGroup()
items.desc: Pops the latest string off of a stack of debug group strings for the command encoder.

items.name: var device: MTLDevice
items.desc: The Metal device from which the command encoder was created.

items.name: var label: String?
items.desc: A string that labels the command encoder.
